tag.description: The setActionListener tag provides a declarative syntax for assigning values before an action fires

attribute.description: the target for the value; must be an EL expression
attribute.name: to

attribute.description: the source of the value; can be an EL expression or a constant value
attribute.name: from

tag.description: The resetActionListener tag provides a declarative syntax for resetting values before an action fires
The returnActionListener tag is a declarative way to allow an action source to return a value from a dialog or process.

attribute.description: The value to return as the dialog/process result. This can be an EL expression or a constant value.
attribute.name: value

tag.description: The fileDownloadActionListener tag provides a declarative syntax for downloading files to a user from a command component.

attribute.description: the content or mime type of the file - e.g., text/html or application/pdf
attribute.name: contentType

attribute.description: the desired or proposed filename. If set, the user will typically be presented with a "Save File" dialog, though this is ultimately at the descretion of the user agent.
attribute.name: filename

attribute.description: an EL binding to the method that will deliver the file contents. The method must take two parameters, a FacesContext and an OutputStream.
attribute.name: method
